text: The University of Richmond (UR or U of R) is a private liberal arts college in Richmond, Virginia, United States. It has five schools: the School of Arts and Sciences; the E. Claiborne Robins School of Business; the Jepson School of Leadership Studies; the University of Richmond School of Law; and the School of Professional & Continuing Studies. ==References== Category:1830 establishments in the United States Category:1830s establishments in Virginia Category:Colleges and universities in Virginia Category:Richmond, Virginia
title: University of Richmond
